evidence.claim: Healthgram utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure.
The platform is compliant with FHIR standards to ensure interoperability.
References to HL7 messaging protocols found in developer documentation.
Integration capabilities for EHR systems mentioned on the careers page.
Describes use of AWS for data storage and processing in case studies.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or being a clearinghouse.
